branchCategory.name: Compact Slide Table with Linear Guide - MXZ
branchCategory.description: <p> The MXZ incorporates a compact cylinder with a linear guide.  The MXZ has a very short overall length compared to other SMC guided actuators yet does not sacrifice anti-deflection capabilities.</p> <p> </p>

breadCrumb.name: Compact Slide Table with Linear Guide - MXZ

branchItem.name: MXZ, Compact Cylinder w/Linear Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The MXZ incorporates a compact cylinder with a linear guide.  The MXZ has a very short overall length compared to other SMC guided actuators yet does not sacrifice anti-deflection capabilities.</p>
